com.mapdigit.gis.vector

Class DataField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapdigit.gis.vector.DataField

  • public final class DataField
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a filed of a database table.

    © Copyright 2009 Guidebee Pty Ltd.
